name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

name: Week 1 - Course Introduction, Syllabus, and Basic Japanese
description: Overview of the course structure, syllabus, and an introduction to basic Japanese language concepts.

lessons.name: Course Overview
lessons.description: Introduction to the course structure and expectations.

lessons.name: Introduction to Japanese Writing Systems
lessons.description: Introduction to the three Japanese writing systems: Hiragana, Katakana, and Kanji.

lessons.name: Basic Japanese Greetings
lessons.description: Learn common greetings and expressions used in daily Japanese conversations.

name: Week 2 - Hiragana and Katakana
description: Focus on mastering the Hiragana and Katakana scripts.

lessons.name: Learning Hiragana
lessons.description: Introduction and practice of Hiragana characters.

lessons.name: Learning Katakana
lessons.description: Introduction and practice of Katakana characters.

lessons.name: Basic Vocabulary Using Hiragana and Katakana
lessons.description: Learning basic Japanese words using the two scripts.

name: Week 3 - Basic Sentence Structure and Particles
description: Introduction to basic sentence construction and the use of essential Japanese particles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Japanese Sentence Structure
lessons.description: Learn about the Subject-Object-Verb (SOV) structure of Japanese sentences.

lessons.name: Japanese Particles: は (wa), が (ga), and を (wo)
lessons.description: Understanding the use of basic particles in Japanese sentences.

lessons.name: Basic Phrases and Introductions
lessons.description: Learn how to introduce yourself and ask basic questions in Japanese.

name: Week 4 - Numbers, Time, and Date
description: Learn how to count, tell time, and talk about dates in Japanese.

lessons.name: Counting in Japanese
lessons.description: Introduction to counting in Japanese from 1 to 100.

lessons.name: Telling Time in Japanese
lessons.description: Learn how to ask for and tell the time in Japanese.

lessons.name: Dates and Days of the Week
lessons.description: Learn how to express dates, months, and days of the week in Japanese.

name: Week 5 - Basic Japanese Grammar and Verb Conjugation
description: Introduction to verb conjugation and basic grammar patterns.

lessons.name: Basic Verb Conjugation (Present Tense)
lessons.description: Learn how to conjugate Japanese verbs in the present tense.

lessons.name: Negative Forms of Verbs
lessons.description: Learn how to conjugate verbs in the negative form.

lessons.name: Introduction to Adjectives
lessons.description: Learn how to use basic adjectives in Japanese sentences.

name: Week 1 - Introduction to Geoguessr and the Basics of Geography
description: Introduction to the game Geoguessr and basic geographical knowledge required for successful play.

lessons.name: Course Overview and Geoguessr Introduction
lessons.description: Overview of the course and an introduction to how Geoguessr works.

lessons.name: Geography Basics: Continents and Countries
lessons.description: Overview of the world's continents and countries to help with location identification.

lessons.name: Understanding Geoguessr’s Map Interface
lessons.description: Learn how to navigate and use the map interface in Geoguessr.

name: Week 2 - Identifying Landscapes and Environmental Cues
description: Learn to identify various landscapes, environments, and natural features to improve your Geoguessr scores.

lessons.name: Recognizing Natural Landforms
lessons.description: How to identify mountains, rivers, deserts, and other key natural landforms in Geoguessr.

lessons.name: Using Vegetation and Climate Cues
lessons.description: Learn to use the types of vegetation and climate indicators to pinpoint locations.

lessons.name: Landmarks and Natural Features
lessons.description: How to identify key landmarks and unique natural features such as volcanoes, lakes, and coastlines.

name: Week 3 - Road Signs, Language, and Street Clues
description: Focus on recognizing road signs, language patterns, and street features to determine locations.

lessons.name: Recognizing Road Signs and Traffic Patterns
lessons.description: Learn to identify common road signs and traffic patterns used around the world.

lessons.name: Decoding Language Clues from Street Signs
lessons.description: How to use street signs and other textual clues to identify regions and languages.

name: Week 4 - Urban vs. Rural Locations
description: Explore how to differentiate between urban and rural locations in Geoguessr.

lessons.name: Urban Areas: Buildings and Infrastructure
lessons.description: How to spot urban environments based on buildings, roads, and infrastructure.

lessons.name: Rural Areas: Identifying Smaller Communities
lessons.description: How to recognize rural locations and smaller settlements based on road quality, signage, and landscape.

name: Week 5 - Geography of Specific Regions
description: Learn about specific regions of the world, helping players identify countries and continents more accurately.

lessons.name: Geography of Europe
lessons.description: Focus on the geography of Europe, including key countries, cities, and landmarks.

lessons.name: Geography of Asia
lessons.description: Learn key geographic features of Asia and how to recognize specific countries.

lessons.name: Geography of Africa and South America
lessons.description: Explore geographical features of Africa and South America, identifying distinct regions and environments.

name: Week 6 - Advanced Strategies for Geoguessr
description: Advanced strategies for improving accuracy and speed in Geoguessr.

lessons.name: Using Time of Day and Sun Position
lessons.description: How to use the sun's position and the time of day to identify locations.

lessons.name: Speed Rounds and Time Management
lessons.description: Techniques for optimizing speed while making accurate guesses.

lessons.name: Leveraging Street View and Aerial Imagery
lessons.description: Mastering the use of street view and aerial imagery to enhance guess accuracy.

name: Week 1 - Introduction to Guitar and Basic Chords
description: Introduction to the guitar, basic anatomy, tuning, and learning your first chords.

lessons.name: Guitar Anatomy and Tuning
lessons.description: Learn the parts of the guitar and how to tune it properly.

lessons.name: How to Hold the Guitar
lessons.description: Proper posture and hand positioning for playing the guitar comfortably.

lessons.name: Basic Chords: C, G, D, and Em
lessons.description: Introduction to open chords: C major, G major, D major, and E minor.

lessons.name: Strumming Patterns 101
lessons.description: Introduction to basic strumming techniques and simple patterns.

name: Week 2 - Reading Tabs, More Chords, and Simple Songs
description: Learn how to read guitar tabs, expand your chord vocabulary, and play simple songs.

lessons.name: Understanding Guitar Tabs
lessons.description: Learn how to read and interpret guitar tabs for playing music.

lessons.name: Minor Chords: Am, Em, Dm
lessons.description: Learn how to play minor chords: A minor, E minor, and D minor.

lessons.name: Simple Songs: 'Twinkle Twinkle' and 'Mary Had a Little Lamb'
lessons.description: Learn to play simple beginner songs using the chords you've learned.

lessons.name: Changing Chords Smoothly
lessons.description: Practice transitioning between chords smoothly and efficiently.

name: Week 3 - Picking Techniques and Power Chords
description: Focus on learning picking techniques, power chords, and their use in songs.

lessons.name: Alternate Picking Technique
lessons.description: Learn alternate picking to improve your playing speed and precision.

lessons.name: Power Chords: Introduction and Application
lessons.description: Learn the structure and use of power chords in rock music.

lessons.name: Strumming vs. Picking: When to Use Each
lessons.description: Learn when to use strumming vs. picking for different musical styles.

lessons.name: Power Chord Songs: 'Smoke on the Water' and 'Seven Nation Army'
lessons.description: Practice playing famous rock riffs using power chords.

name: Week 4 - Barre Chords and Song Progressions
description: Learn how to play barre chords and start understanding common song progressions.

lessons.name: Introduction to Barre Chords
lessons.description: Learn how to play barre chords and their importance in more advanced playing.

lessons.name: Major and Minor Barre Chords: F and Bm
lessons.description: Learn how to play major and minor barre chords, focusing on F and Bm.

lessons.name: Common Song Progressions: I-IV-V
lessons.description: Learn common chord progressions used in many popular songs.

lessons.name: Barre Chord Songs: 'Wish You Were Here' and 'Let It Be'
lessons.description: Practice using barre chords in popular songs with common progressions.

lessons.name: Creating Your Own Progressions
lessons.description: Learn how to create your own chord progressions and experiment with different keys.

name: Week 5 - Fingerstyle and Advanced Techniques
description: Learn fingerstyle technique and explore more advanced guitar skills.

lessons.name: Introduction to Fingerstyle Playing
lessons.description: Learn the basics of fingerstyle guitar playing and how to pluck strings with your fingers.

lessons.name: Basic Fingerpicking Patterns
lessons.description: Practice basic fingerpicking patterns and techniques.

lessons.name: Hammer-Ons, Pull-Offs, and Slides
lessons.description: Learn essential advanced techniques like hammer-ons, pull-offs, and slides.

lessons.name: Applying Fingerstyle to Songs
lessons.description: Learn how to apply fingerstyle technique to simple songs like 'Blackbird' and 'Dust in the Wind'.

name: Week 1 - Introduction to Ballroom Dance and Basic Steps
description: Introduction to ballroom dance styles and basic footwork and posture.

lessons.name: Ballroom Dance Overview
lessons.description: Introduction to the different styles of ballroom dancing, including Latin, Standard, and Social Dance.

lessons.name: Basic Dance Posture
lessons.description: Learn the correct posture and body alignment for ballroom dancing.

lessons.name: The Basic Box Step (Waltz)
lessons.description: Learn the basic box step for the waltz and understand the rhythm.

lessons.name: Basic Rhythm and Timing
lessons.description: Introduction to the concept of timing in ballroom dancing and how to stay in sync with music.

name: Week 2 - Waltz and Tango Basics
description: Focus on learning the fundamentals of the waltz and an introduction to the tango.

lessons.name: Waltz: Step Variations and Flow
lessons.description: Learn variations of the basic waltz step and practice continuous movement.

lessons.name: Understanding Tango: Basic Steps
lessons.description: Introduction to the distinctive steps and posture of the tango.

lessons.name: Tango: Connection and Lead/Follow
lessons.description: Learn how to establish a strong lead-follow connection in the tango.

name: Week 3 - Rumba and Cha-Cha Basics
description: Introduction to Latin ballroom dances: the rumba and cha-cha.

lessons.name: Rumba: Basic Step and Timing
lessons.description: Learn the basic rumba step and its slow-quick-quick rhythm.

lessons.name: Cha-Cha: The Basic Step
lessons.description: Learn the basic cha-cha step with its characteristic rhythm.

lessons.name: Cha-Cha: Cross-Body Lead and Turns
lessons.description: Introduction to the cross-body lead and basic turns in the cha-cha.

lessons.name: Rumba: Adding Style and Technique
lessons.description: Learn how to add Latin flair and style to the rumba.

name: Week 4 - Foxtrot and Quickstep Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of the foxtrot and quickstep, two elegant standard ballroom dances.

lessons.name: Foxtrot: Basic Step and Movement
lessons.description: Introduction to the smooth movements of the foxtrot and its box step variation.

lessons.name: Quickstep: Speed and Timing
lessons.description: Learn how to execute the quickstep with its fast-paced rhythm and smooth transitions.

lessons.name: Foxtrot: Turning and Navigation
lessons.description: Learn how to incorporate turns and changes in direction while dancing the foxtrot.

lessons.name: Quickstep: Complex Patterns
lessons.description: Master complex quickstep patterns and how to navigate them smoothly.

name: Week 5 - Dance Lead and Follow Techniques
description: Focus on improving lead-follow techniques and establishing better dance connection.

lessons.name: The Lead-Follow Dynamic
lessons.description: Introduction to the concept of lead and follow in partner dancing, including signals and communication.

lessons.name: Lead-Follow in Latin Dances
lessons.description: How lead-follow works specifically in Latin dances like the cha-cha and rumba.

lessons.name: Lead-Follow in Standard Dances
lessons.description: Establishing a strong lead-follow dynamic in dances like the waltz and foxtrot.

lessons.name: Dancing in Sync: Timing and Coordination
lessons.description: How to stay in sync with your partner and the music while maintaining proper timing.

name: Week 6 - Social Dance Etiquette and Styling
description: Learn about social dance etiquette and adding personal style to your performances.

lessons.name: Social Dance Etiquette: Do's and Don'ts
lessons.description: Learn the basic rules of social dance etiquette, including partner respect and floorcraft.

lessons.name: Adding Style to Your Dancing
lessons.description: Learn how to add personal flair and style to your movements, from arm styling to footwork.

lessons.name: Improving Performance: Expression and Confidence
lessons.description: Develop confidence and expressiveness in your dancing to captivate your audience.

name: Week 1 - Introduction to Algorithms and Basic Data Structures
description: Introduction to algorithms, problem-solving techniques, and basic data structures.

lessons.name: What is an Algorithm?
lessons.description: Understanding the concept of algorithms and their role in problem-solving.

lessons.name: Algorithm Complexity: Big O Notation
lessons.description: Introduction to algorithm efficiency and time complexity using Big O notation.

lessons.name: Arrays and Lists: Basic Operations
lessons.description: Learn about arrays and linked lists, their properties, and how to perform basic operations on them.

lessons.name: Searching Algorithms: Linear and Binary Search
lessons.description: Understand and implement basic searching algorithms like linear and binary search.

name: Week 2 - Stacks, Queues, and Recursion
description: Explore stack and queue data structures and dive into recursion as a problem-solving technique.

lessons.name: Stacks and Their Operations
lessons.description: Learn about stack data structures, their LIFO (Last In, First Out) property, and common operations.

lessons.name: Queues and Their Operations
lessons.description: Learn about queue data structures, their FIFO (First In, First Out) property, and common operations.

lessons.name: Recursion: Concepts and Base Cases
lessons.description: Introduction to recursion and understanding how to break down problems into smaller subproblems.

lessons.name: Recursion in Practice: Factorial and Fibonacci
lessons.description: Implement common problems like factorial and Fibonacci sequence using recursion.

name: Week 3 - Sorting Algorithms
description: Study common sorting algorithms and their time complexities.

lessons.name: Bubble Sort and Selection Sort
lessons.description: Implement simple sorting algorithms like bubble sort and selection sort and understand their efficiency.

lessons.name: Merge Sort: Divide and Conquer
lessons.description: Learn the divide-and-conquer approach using merge sort, including its time complexity.

lessons.name: Quick Sort: Partitioning and Recursion
lessons.description: Learn about the quick sort algorithm, its partitioning method, and recursive approach.

lessons.name: Comparing Sorting Algorithms
lessons.description: Compare the performance of different sorting algorithms based on time and space complexity.

name: Week 4 - Trees and Binary Search Trees
description: Introduction to tree data structures, with a focus on binary search trees (BSTs).

lessons.name: Tree Structures and Basic Operations
lessons.description: Understand the structure of trees and learn basic operations like insertion, deletion, and traversal.

lessons.name: Binary Trees and Their Properties
lessons.description: Learn about binary trees, their structure, and common traversal techniques.

lessons.name: Binary Search Trees (BST): Insertion and Search
lessons.description: Learn how binary search trees work, including operations like insertion and searching.

lessons.name: BST: Deletion and Balancing
lessons.description: Understand how to delete nodes in a binary search tree and techniques for balancing the tree.

name: Week 5 - Graphs and Graph Algorithms
description: Introduction to graphs and common graph traversal and search algorithms.

lessons.name: Graph Representation: Adjacency Matrix and List
lessons.description: Learn about different ways to represent graphs using adjacency matrices and adjacency lists.

lessons.name: Breadth-First Search (BFS)
lessons.description: Learn the breadth-first search algorithm and its applications in finding the shortest path in unweighted graphs.

lessons.name: Depth-First Search (DFS)
lessons.description: Learn the depth-first search algorithm and its application in exploring all possible paths in a graph.

lessons.name: Shortest Path Algorithms: Dijkstra's and Bellman-Ford
lessons.description: Understand and implement Dijkstra's and Bellman-Ford algorithms for finding the shortest path in weighted graphs.

name: Week 6 - Advanced Data Structures and Dynamic Programming
description: Learn about advanced data structures and dynamic programming techniques to solve complex problems.

lessons.name: Hash Tables and Hashing
lessons.description: Understand hash tables, their structure, and how to handle collisions using different hashing techniques.

lessons.name: Heaps and Priority Queues
lessons.description: Learn about heap data structures and how to implement priority queues for efficient data retrieval.

lessons.name: Dynamic Programming: Principles and Memoization
lessons.description: Introduction to dynamic programming and how to optimize recursive solutions using memoization.

lessons.name: Solving Problems with Dynamic Programming
lessons.description: Apply dynamic programming techniques to solve problems like the knapsack problem and longest common subsequence.

name: Week 1 - Introduction to Chess Openings
description: Overview of chess openings and the importance of early game strategy.

lessons.name: What is a Chess Opening?
lessons.description: Understanding the role and purpose of openings in chess and why they are important for setting up the middle game.

lessons.name: Principles of Chess Openings
lessons.description: Learn the core principles of chess openings: controlling the center, developing pieces, and ensuring king safety.

lessons.name: Common Opening Mistakes to Avoid
lessons.description: Identify common mistakes beginners make in the opening and learn how to avoid them.

name: Week 2 - The Italian Game and the Ruy Lopez
description: Explore two classic openings: the Italian Game and the Ruy Lopez, both popular choices at all levels.

lessons.name: The Italian Game: Move by Move
lessons.description: Learn the moves and key ideas behind the Italian Game opening, with a focus on the move 1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4.

lessons.name: The Ruy Lopez: Move by Move
lessons.description: An introduction to the Ruy Lopez opening (1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5), focusing on early piece development and positional play.

lessons.name: Common Variations of the Ruy Lopez
lessons.description: Study popular variations within the Ruy Lopez, including the Morphy Defense and the Berlin Defense.

name: Week 3 - The Sicilian Defense
description: In-depth exploration of the Sicilian Defense, one of the most popular responses to 1. e4.

lessons.name: Introduction to the Sicilian Defense
lessons.description: Understand the fundamentals of the Sicilian Defense (1. e4 c5) and why it is a strong choice for black.

lessons.name: Key Variations of the Sicilian: Najdorf and Dragon
lessons.description: Study key variations of the Sicilian Defense, including the Najdorf and Dragon variations, focusing on their strategic ideas.

lessons.name: Attacking and Counterattacking in the Sicilian
lessons.description: Learn the key attacking ideas and counterattacking strategies for both sides in the Sicilian Defense.

lessons.name: Sicilian for Beginners: Common Traps
lessons.description: Explore common tactical traps in the Sicilian Defense and how to avoid them.

name: Week 4 - The French Defense and the Caro-Kann Defense
description: Study two solid, defensive openings for black: the French Defense and the Caro-Kann Defense.

lessons.name: The French Defense: Move by Move
lessons.description: Learn the French Defense (1. e4 e6), focusing on pawn structure and counterplay ideas.

lessons.name: The Advance Variation in the French Defense
lessons.description: Study the Advance Variation (3. e5) and understand how to handle black's counterplay in this line.

lessons.name: The Caro-Kann Defense: Move by Move
lessons.description: Learn the Caro-Kann Defense (1. e4 c6), a solid defense that aims for strong central control and a safe king.

lessons.name: The Advance Variation in the Caro-Kann
lessons.description: Explore the Advance Variation (3. e5) in the Caro-Kann Defense and strategies for black to break the pawn chain.

name: Week 5 - The King's Indian Defense and the Grünfeld Defense
description: Learn two highly dynamic and complex defenses for black: the King's Indian Defense and the Grünfeld Defense.

lessons.name: The King's Indian Defense: Move by Move
lessons.description: Explore the King's Indian Defense (1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 g6), focusing on counterattacking plans and kingside pawn storms.

lessons.name: The Grünfeld Defense: Move by Move
lessons.description: Learn the Grünfeld Defense (1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 g6 3. Nc3 d5), known for its counterattacking ideas and dynamic pawn structure.

lessons.name: Key Ideas in the King's Indian and Grünfeld
lessons.description: Study key attacking and positional ideas for both the King's Indian and Grünfeld Defense.

lessons.name: Strategic Plans in the King's Indian and Grünfeld
lessons.description: Understand long-term strategic plans and common tactical motifs in the King's Indian and Grünfeld defenses.

name: Week 6 - Hypermodern Openings and Other Defenses
description: Explore hypermodern openings and less common defenses that offer unorthodox but effective strategies.

lessons.name: Introduction to Hypermodern Openings
lessons.description: Learn about hypermodern openings, where the center is controlled indirectly using pieces rather than pawns.

lessons.name: The Pirc Defense and the Modern Defense
lessons.description: Study the Pirc Defense (1. e4 d6) and Modern Defense (1. e4 g6), both hypermodern approaches aiming for flexibility.

lessons.name: The English Opening
lessons.description: An introduction to the English Opening (1. c4), a flexible and strategic opening used to control the center indirectly.

lessons.name: Other Unconventional Openings
lessons.description: Learn about unconventional openings like the Scandinavian Defense, the Alekhine Defense, and others.
